Convert a correlation data frame to matrix format

Source: R/utility.R
as_matrix.Rd

Convert a correlation data frame to original matrix format.

as_matrix(x, diagonal)

Arguments

x

A correlation data frame. See correlate or as_cordf.
diagonal

Value (typically numeric or NA) to set the diagonal to

Value

Correlation matrix

Examples

x <- correlate(mtcars)

#> 
#> Correlation method: 'pearson'
#> Missing treated using: 'pairwise.complete.obs'
as_matrix(x)

#>             mpg        cyl       disp         hp        drat         wt
#> mpg          NA -0.8521620 -0.8475514 -0.7761684  0.68117191 -0.8676594

Contents

corrr is a part of the tidymodels ecosystem, a collection of modeling packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy.

Developed by Max Kuhn, Simon Jackson, Jorge Cimentada. Site built by pkgdown.
